name: Pexels, Inc.
description: Pexels, Inc. is a leading provider of high-quality, free stock photos and videos, dedicated to empowering creators worldwide. Founded in 2014, Pexels aims to democratize access to stunning visual content, enabling bloggers, marketers, and designers to find the perfect visuals for their projects without the burden of licensing fees. The platform hosts a vast library of curated images and videos contributed by talented photographers and videographers, ensuring a diverse collection that caters to various themes and styles. Pexels prioritizes user experience by offering powerful search functionalities and a user-friendly interface, making it easy to discover and download visuals. The company also fosters a vibrant community by encouraging contributors to share their work and connect with other creatives. Beyond providing resources for individuals, Pexels collaborates with businesses and educational institutions, offering tailored solutions for brand campaigns, marketing materials, and educational content. With a clear mission to support creativity and innovation, Pexels continues to expand its offerings and enhance its platform, further solidifying its position as a go-to resource for high-quality free media.

seo.meta_title: Pexels, Inc. | Free Stock Photos and Videos
seo.meta_description: Explore Pexels, Inc., your go-to source for high-quality free stock photos and videos. Join millions of creators in discovering stunning visuals for your projects.

faq.question: What is Pexels known for?
faq.answer: Pexels is known for providing high-quality free stock photos and videos to creatives and businesses.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Pexels?
faq.answer: Julian Chokkattu is the CEO of Pexels, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Pexels headquartered?
faq.answer: Pexels is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

faq.question: What types of content does Pexels offer?
faq.answer: Pexels offers high-resolution stock photos and free video clips for personal and commercial use.
